name: Draft Proposal
description: To be done by end of day

name: Operation Cupcake
description: Infiltrate the kitchen and replace all healthy snacks with cupcakes. Stealth is key!

name: Dinosaur Discovery
description: Find and categorize all 'dinosaur bones' (aka chicken bones) in the backyard excavation site.

name: Alien Communication
description: Develop a new language consisting entirely of emojis to communicate with hypothetical aliens.

name: Superhero Summit
description: Organize a meeting with all neighborhood superheroes. Dress code: Capes and masks only.

name: Zombie Apocalypse Drill
description: Conduct a readiness drill for a zombie apocalypse. Bonus points for convincing the cat to participate.

name: Time Travel Experiment
description: Attempt to time travel by spinning around really fast. Document any centuries visited.

name: Invisible Ink Testing
description: Write a top-secret message using lemon juice. Reveal it using heat and see if it summons a spy.

name: Undercover Unicorn
description: Disguise the dog as a unicorn and see if anyone in the neighborhood notices.

name: Pirate Treasure Hunt
description: Create a treasure map leading to the 'lost treasure' hidden somewhere in the living room.

name: Garden Gnome Liberation
description: Relocate garden gnomes to new, exciting spots in the garden for a change of scenery.
